  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_100709</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_100709</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Purification of rock salt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reinigung des Felsensalzes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Purification de sel de roche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Purification do sal da rocha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Purificazione del sale della roccia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθαρισμός του άλατος βράχου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Purificación de la sal de la roca</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is the second of four illustrations showing the steps to purify rock salt. The crushed rock salt is added to water.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">purification</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rock salt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist die Sekunde von vier Abbildungen, 
welche die Jobsteps zeigen, um Felsensalz zu reinigen. Das 
zerquetschte Felsensalz wird Wasser hinzugefügt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est la seconde de quatre illustrations montrant
les étapes pour épurer le sel de roche. Le sel concassé de 
pierres est ajouté à l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é o segundo de quatro ilustrações que 
mostram as etapas para purify o sal da rocha. O sal esmagado da 
rocha é adicionado à água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è il secondo di quattro illustrazioni che 
mostrano i punti per purificare il sale della roccia. Il sale 
frantumato della pietra è aggiunto ad acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι η δεύτερη τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που 
εμφανίζουν τα βήματα για να καθαρίσει το άλας βράχου. Το 
συντριμμένο άλας βράχου προστίθεται στο ύδωρ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es el segundo de cuatro ilustraciones que 
muestran los pasos de progresión para purificar la sal de la roca. 
La sal machacada de la roca se agrega al agua.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reinigung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Felsensalz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lösung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">purification</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sel de roche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">purification</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sal da rocha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">purificazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sale della roccia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">soluzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καθαρισμός</string>
